sub_title: Sales Key Account Executive and Business Developer across the Global Semiconductor and Capital Equipment High-tech Industries.
summary:
Thank you for visiting my profile. As you will note from a short glimpse profile, I am a seasoned individual with key skills in Revenue Growth, Business and Operations Oversight, and Acquisition Integration.
I am a highly meticulous professional with experience of achieving business development goals through identification and capitalization of challenging growth opportunities across Semiconductor and Capital Equipment High-tech Industries.
Having progressed through a broad spectrum of roles, I am a talented professional having a strong background and extensive experience in this field. 
My expertise is at developing and deploying campaigns to increase corporate awareness, customer engagement, and sales opportunities in very dynamic high-tech industries. 
Throughout my career, I devised and implemented strategic business development and growth plans with focus on leveraging long-term corporate success. 
Employers recognize me for execution of revenue assurance initiatives to significantly elevate business profitability and sales. 
Background of creating and implementing global business and commercial processes in continuously evolving environments by designing and executing reliable account management control processes. 
History of implementing programs for performance and productivity enhancement through utilisation of leadership skills in multi-cultural environments, especially Asian cultures.
I’m having a credible record of cultivating positive partnerships with leading enterprises as well as building and leading cohesive/dedicated teams focusing on achieving highest potential and full team success.

The areas where I really expel are:
- Strategic Sales & Marketing
- Sales Plans Execution
- Key Account Management	
- Business Development 
- Team Leadership & Development
- Relationship Building

My passion is for delivering service and leadership that goes beyond organizational expectations. Connect with me today or send me an email at erik.corduwener@hotmail.com with any thoughts, comments, or questions about my work — I'm always interested in making new professional acquaintances!
